review: I purchased this device primarily to view Netflix and HBOGo.  The HBOGo app was easy to download, however, downloading my existing Netflix account required a manual update of the device.  I was only able figure out how to update the device after reading posts from other Fire TV users having the same problem. The tutorial provided was of little help. Amazon needs to realize that not all users are Gen Y's.
